definition: variant of 諉過|诿过[wei3 guo4]
surname Wei
same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly
surname Guo
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
(experienced action marker)
to put the blame on sb else
to delay/to postpone
to gain from corrupt dealing/to engage in graft/to feather one's nest
to adopt/to pass/to vote approval (of a law etc)
reward and punishment
to forgive
to rebuke/to blame/to denounce
to get things done relying on others (idiom); with a little help from his friends
to neglect/to trifle with/not to take seriously
to decide and act alone (idiom); to take arbitrary action/a law unto oneself
to rebel/sedition/to delude/confused
to demote/to dismiss
(lit.) to hold sb by the elbow/(fig.) to hold back/to impede/to handicap
to decide alone without consultation/arbitrary/dictatorial
to censure/to denounce/to impeach
to decide and act alone (idiom); to take arbitrary action/a law unto oneself
